rdf:Description.dc:title: Observations of the Northern Conference : Circuit and rural court justice in the north, March 11-16, 1984, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories : A report 1984 Circuit and rural court justice in the north, March 11-16, 1984, Yellowknife, Northwest Territories : A report /
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Daniels, Dorothy.
Alberta. Native Peoples Programme.
Northern Conference (1984 : Yellowknife, N.W.T.)
rdf:Description.dc:description: Conference was held to provide a forum for a cross section of justice administrators from across Canada and Alaska to discuss the issues, problems and some of the solutions in providing rural and circuit court justice services. Publications is a summary of some of the proceedings based on the notes of one attendee.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Indians of North America
Indians of North America
